summary: Plagued by revolutionaries that harass his plantation in a banana republic, fruit company exec Steve Case rehires former nemesis Nick Butler to restore order and profits.
cast: James Cagney|Ann Sheridan|Pat O'Brien|Andy Devine|Helen Vinson|Jerome Cowan|George Tobias|George Reeves|Victor Kilian|Frank Puglia|John Ridgely|Grady Sutton|Paul Porcasi|Frank Yaconelli|Dick Botiller|Frank Mayo|Jack Mower|Paul Hurst|George Regas|Elvira Sánchez|Rafael Alcayde|Trevor Bardette|Ray Beltram|Eumenio Blanco|Max Blum|Joe Dominguez|Elias Gamboa|George Humbert|Manuel López|Joe Molinas|George Nardelli|Don Orlando|Tony Paton|Ralph Peters|Ernesto Piedra|Paul Renay|Victor Sabini|Betty Sanko|Paul Stathes|Leo White|Tom Wilson
title: Torrid Zone
